properties.description: A warm space for adults and elderly people to come and not be alone. We have different activities such as: arm Chair aerobics, craft, board games and adult colouring.
properties.title: The Salvation Army Ballymoney

properties.address: Hope Centre, 10 Hillmans Way, Coleraine, Co Londonderry BT52 2ED
properties.description: Our Open Door drop-in environment is situated in the Hope Centre cafe where we have a team of befrienders who can provide emotional, practical or financial support over a coffee and something to eat. It's a warm, welcoming environment that is open for all.
properties.title: Vineyard Compassion
